item.title: World Atlas
item.content:
A simple word game using some django in the backend and javascript for frontend.
Tech stack: 1. Django 2. Django-Rest-Framework 3. Javascript
Django rest framework as an api for most of the operations in the game like:
1. Validating a user input place from database 2. Listing out all places from a given letter 3. Get a random place from a given letter 4. CRUD endpoint for the places in the database.
API Link: https://djangonaut.pythonanywhere.com/world-atlas/api/
